src:
Voznik v jarku ujet v avtu
Na pomoč so prišli gasilci JZ GRD GE Nova Gorica.
02 Nov 2019, 07:43 by A. L.
BRDA – Ob 3.17 je voznik, italijanski državljan, med naseljema Dobrovo in Neblo, občina Brda, z osebnim vozilom zapeljal v obcestni jarek in obstal na boku. Pri tem se ni poškodoval.Gasilci JZ GRD GE Nova Gorica so zavarovali kraj nesreče, s tehničnim posegom vozilo postavili na kolesa in iz njega rešili voznika. Na poškodovanem vozilu so preventivno odklopili akumulator ter posuli in počistili razlite motorne tekočine, poroča uprava za zaščito in reševanje.
text:
The driver is trapped in a car in a ditch
Firefighters from SW GRD GE Nova Gorica came to the rescue.
02 Nov 2019, 07:43 by A.L.
BRDA - At 3.17am, a driver, an Italian citizen, drove between the villages of Dobrovo and Neblo, Brda municipality, with a personal vehicle, drove into a roadside ditch and stood on the side. It did not injure itself. Firefighters of the SW GRD GE Nova Gorica protected the scene of the accident, with technical intervention put the vehicle on wheels and rescued the driver from it. The damaged vehicle was preventively disconnected from the battery and spilled and cleaned up with spilled engine fluids, the Protection and Rescue Administration reports.
